data.why:
I interest create modules for Computer::Theory. Future works:
    Module for Finite State Automaton (Computer::Theory::FSA), implement
    algorithms for valide/verify DFA (Deterministic Finite Automaton),
    valide/verify NFA (Non-deterministic Finite Automaton), convert
    NFA::DFA and theory of minimization automanton.
